Welcome to My MBA Portfolio


I’m Yuvraaj Singh Kohli, an MBA student passionate about business strategy, digital transformation, and leadership. Explore my academic and professional journey below.


🎓 Education MBA in Business Administration 📍 University Name (2023 – Present) Relevant coursework: Strategic Management, Financial Accounting, Marketing Analysis.
